description:
Welcome to the Ultimate Survival Arena!


Get ready for the most addictive and chaotic survival experience on Nintendo Switch™! Gigabonk: Mega Survivors throws you into a vibrant, fast-paced world where only the strongest survive. Grow your character, dodge countless enemies, and unleash mega-powerful attacks to become the ultimate champion!

KEY FEATURES:

ADDICTIVE GAMEPLAY: Easy to pick up, impossible to put down! Move with intuitive controls and unleash automatic attacks. Your goal is simple: survive and dominate!
GROW & EVOLVE: Start small, but don't stay that way! Collect experience gems from defeated enemies and watch your character grow in size and power. Evolve during the match to unlock devastating new abilities!
CHAOTIC BATTLE ROYALE: You are not alone! Dozens of other players and bots are fighting for the same goal. Outmaneuver them, trap them, and be the last survivor in this epic IO-style battle.
POWERFUL SKILLS & WEAPONS: Unlock a unique arsenal of super attacks and special skills. From giant hammers to energy blasts, find your favorite playstyle and bonk everyone out of your way!
VIBRANT MAPS: Battle across multiple colorful and dynamic maps, each with its own unique layout and challenges.
QUICK & THRILLING MATCHES: Each round is a new chance for victory! Enjoy fast-paced 3-5 minute matches perfect for gaming on the go.
Why Gigabonk: Mega Survivors?

If you love popular survival IO games, you will be instantly hooked on Gigabonk! We took the formula you love and injected it with a dose of pure, unadulterated fun, vibrant visuals, and satisfying combat that will keep you coming back for "just one more round."

Download Gigabonk: Mega Survivors now and start your journey to become the Mega Survivor!
